summary: An airplane, or aeroplane, is a vehicle that flies through the air with fixed wings. It moves using engines like jet propellers. Airplanes have many uses, from fun activities to transporting people and goods, even in military operations. The Wright brothers made the first successful airplane in 1903, building on ideas from earlier pioneers. Since then, airplanes have become faster and more advanced, with jet engines and computer controls. They've played a big role in wars and now carry billions of passengers each year.
title: Airplane
